com.communote.server.service

Class ClientCreationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.service.ClientCreationService

  • @Service
public class ClientCreationService
extends Object
    Service for creating and updating a client.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • createGlobalClient

        public void createGlobalClient(String clientName,
                               String timeZoneId)
                        throws InvalidClientIdException
        Create the global client.
        Parameters:
        clientName - The name of the global client.
        timeZoneId - The ID of the time zone, used for the global client.
        Throws:
        InvalidClientIdException - in case of an invalid client id

      • initGlobalClient

        public void initGlobalClient()
                      throws ClientInitializationException
        Initialize the global client on startup.
        Throws:
        ClientInitializationException - in case the initialization failed

      • initializeGlobalClient

        public void initializeGlobalClient(UserVO adminAccount,
                                   Map<ApplicationProperty,String> params)
                            throws Exception
        Initializes the global client
        Parameters:
        clientName - Name of the global client.
        adminAccount - the first administrator of the global client
        params - list of application parameters to set
        Throws:
        Exception - in case of an error

      • updateClientName

        public void updateClientName(String clientName)
                      throws AuthorizationException,
                             ClientNotFoundException
        Update the name of the current client.
        Parameters:
        clientName - the new name to set
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not client manager
        ClientNotFoundException - in case the current client got removed
